Gotron

Gotron was at his post when a bot started yelling at the doors.

"Lord Zardus, this bot requests an audience with you. Shall I let him 
in?"
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

"Alright now, listen up. This is the entrance to my secret cave. You 
all must stick close to me, for if you make a wrong turn, you may be 
lost in these catacombs forever! Followm me."

Vulois entered the tunnel.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix turned around.

"Fliq, take Ramulus and find a spot where it will be easy to remove 
the Ark. I'm going to go find some tools."

Brix walked off. Fliq turned to Ramulus.

"Come one! Follow me."
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Zava took some rocket launchers and started modifying them so they 
could aim better. She couldn't keep her eyes off Deemos. She 
whispered to herself.

"Ah, he's so handsome! I've got to find a way to get closer to him."
Zava smiled as she continued to work.
______________________________________________________________________
Noble/Savage

The Beast was back in his original wolf mode. The scars had set in. 
Just a few more days of resting, and gathering strength. He gave 
those bots just a warning this time. Soon he would return, and he 
will take no mercy!
